name: 賴冠廷
objective:
The goal of this course is to introduce fundamental theories behind deep reinforcement learning and summarize the state-of-the-art research results. We will also teach how to use Python deep learning framework (TensorFlow & PyTorch) and demonstrate how to train software agents to learn different tasks. The content includes:
1.Introduction to Reinforcement Learning
2. Finite Markov Decision Processes
3.Tabular Learning and Dynamic Programming
4.Monte Carlo Methods
5.Temporal-Difference Learning
6.Deep Q-Networks (DQN)
7.Actor-Critic Methods (A3C & A2C)
8.Trust Regions – TRPO, PPO and ACKTR
schedule:
1.Introduction to Reinforcement Learning

4. Dynamic Programming

9. OpenAI Gym

11.Trust Regions – TRPO, PPO and ACKTR
12. Stocks Trading using RL
13. Chatbots Training with RL
14. AlphaGoZero
15. RL in Virtual Reality
16. Microsoft AirSim
materials:
1. Maxim Lapan, "Deep Reinforcement Learning Hands-On", Packt Publishing, 2018 (ISBN-13: 978-1788834247)
2. Richard S. Sutton and Andrew G. Barto, "Reinforcement Learning: An Introduction," A Bradford Book, 2018 (ISBN-13: 978-0262039246)
